metadata.description: AI-powered developer assistants for code auditing, research, and multi-model consultation

plugins.name: codebase-health
plugins.description: Codebase health tools: /deep-audit, /quick-check, /dead-code, /update-docs for code quality and documentation maintenance

plugins.name: codex-consultant
plugins.description: Get second opinions from OpenAI Codex CLI on code reviews and architecture

plugins.name: gemini-consultant
plugins.description: Get second opinions from Google Gemini CLI on code reviews and architecture

plugins.name: research-assistant
plugins.description: Research libraries and APIs: /research for comprehensive research, /official-docs for pre-task doc lookups
